channel.title: Comments on: Millions of Forum Links Suddenly Cried Out

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Think for Furl archiving, you have to have a furl account to see my archives. Generally, I try to SS the page and post an image for the non-furl-subscribers.
Shoot me an email on what's missing or if you have some advice on archiving transient material.
item.content:encoded:
Think for Furl archiving, you have to have a furl account to see my archives. Generally, I try to SS the page and post an image for the non-furl-subscribers.

Shoot me an email on what’s missing or if you have some advice on archiving transient material.

item.title: By: Mr. Scott (not the ST guy)
item.dc:creator: Mr. Scott (not the ST guy)
item.description: It should be noted that most of the Furl archive links do not work, at least previous to the time of this post (2006.08.29). I guess it depends how far into the future they should be -proofed. :)
item.content:encoded: It should be noted that most of the Furl archive links do not work, at least previous to the time of this post (2006.08.29). I guess it depends how far into the future they should be -proofed. ðŸ™‚
